results.title: Basic film photography
results.brief_description: Gives practical demonstrations of the best ways to film a variety of subjects, intercut with comic situations of things that can go wrong. No other credits available.

results.title: Basic film language
results.creator_credit: Victoria. Audio-Visual Education Centre, Ross Campbell and Ivan Gaal
results.brief_description: Shows the basic language of camera work in a clear and linear style within the context of a planned film. In two parts; “The Encounter”, the first part, is silent and shows Bob Thornycroft and Joe Bolza mime an encounter between death and a grave digger. “The Elements in Detail”, the second part, shows all the film techniques used being carefully analysed as the action is repeated and also analyses different shots that can be used by students.
results.creator_credit_for_label: Victoria. Audio-Visual Education Centre, Ross Campbell and Ivan Gaal

results.title: Basic film editing
results.creator_credit: Pyramid Films and Paul Burnford Educational Films
results.brief_description: This film illustrates basic techniques of piecing a film together. The camera viewpoint, as well as long, medium and close-up shots, are manipulated to vary effects. No other credits available.

results.title: Basic electricity
results.brief_description: An explanation in simple terms of the fundamentals of electricity, including voltage, current, resistance, magnetic fields, induction, primary and secondary coils, series and parallel circuits. No other credits available.

results.title: Basic ecology: Lakes - aging and pollution
results.brief_description: Explains the aging process of lakes. Examines the typical plant, fish and animal life found in various lake habitats. Investigates the changing water quality and the succession of organisms throughout the aging process. Emphasises the human impact in speeding this process.
results.description: Explains the aging process of lakes. Examines the typical plant, fish and animal life found in various lake habitats. Investigates the changing water quality and the succession of organisms throughout the aging process. Emphasises the human impact in speeding this process.

results.brief_description: Shows the utility of computers in the performance of routine administrative and business tasks. Outlines the steps in the computer process along with names of parts, terms usages.

results.title: Basic chemistry: family of halogens
results.brief_description: Shows the similarity and graduation of properties of the halogens and explains both the similarities and differences in degree on the basis of atomic structure. Looks at the properties of other families of elements in the Periodic Table. Suitable for upper secondary level.

results.title: Basic breadmaking
results.brief_description: Techniques of baking yeast bread are demonstrated for white loaf bread; crescent, cloverleaf and twist dinner rolls, also cinnamon rolls. Quick bread techniques are also shown for biscuits and muffins. Time-lapse photography is used during rising and baking processes.
results.description: Techniques of baking yeast bread are demonstrated for white loaf bread; crescent, cloverleaf and twist dinner rolls, also cinnamon rolls. Quick bread techniques are also shown for biscuits and muffins. Time-lapse photography is used during rising and baking processes.

results.title: Bashu: the little stranger
results.creator_credit: Institute for the Intellectual Dev of Children and Young Adults, A Zarin and Bahram Beizai
results.brief_description: A strong pacifist theme underlines this moving story of Bashu, a terrified ten year old who escapes the bombing that kills his family and destroys his village. Stowing away on a truck travelling from the South to the North, Bashu meets Nai, a woman who shelters him. Gradually Nai accepts him as a son and tries to initiate him into the ways of life in the region. They discover new grounds for a closer spiritual relationship when Nai keeps the boy despite objections from relatives and neighbours. Nai’s husband returns home, approves of his wife’s decision and adopts Bashu. This subtly crafted film was banned in Iran for six years and was only released after the Iran/Iraq war. Starring S. Taslimi, P. Poor Hosseini and A. Afravian. Persian language with English subtitles.
